name: Reflected Slime
description:
This game was made for a 72 hour Game Jam hosted by Ben Bonk, Reflected Slime is basically an Endless Runner using Two Sides of the Platform, if you like a challenge than you'll find it fun for a few minutes!  But if you don't, I'm sorry, I may or may not add an easy mode depending on how well this game is received.

Controls

E/Enter - Flip     ||     Arrow Key/Space - Jump
